SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Comment
Adds a comment to a configuration field in the generated YAML/JSONC/TOML file.
ConfigAdapters
Simple registry for config value adapters.
ConfigFile
Marks a class as a configuration file.
ConfigManager
Platform-agnostic configuration manager using annotation-driven mapping and Jackson (YAML/JSON/JSONC/TOML).
ConfigMigration
Defines a migration step for configuration data.
ConfigReloadable
Marks which sections of a config can be hot-reloaded.
ConfigSection
Marks a field as a configuration section.
ConfigSerializable
Marks a class as serializable for configuration.
ConfigSerializer
Handles serialization and deserialization of complex config objects.
ConfigValue
Marks a field as a configuration value.
ConfigValueAdapter<T>
Adapter for custom types used in configs.
DefaultValue
Specifies default value for a configuration field.
DefaultValueProvider<T>
Interface for providing default values for complex types.
EnumAdapter<E>
Generic adapter for enums using their name() for serialization.
ListItemProcessor<T>
Interface for processing list items during configuration loading.
ListItemProcessor.ProcessResult<T>
Result of processing a list item.
ListProcessor
Specifies a processor for list values.
NoDefaultValueProvider
Dummy provider class used as default value for DefaultValue annotation.
SaveTo
Specifies that a field should be saved to a different file.
